lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to use throughout the day.
  • Nice to meet you! - A polite phrase when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting ways.

items.en: What time do you usually wake up?
items.explanation_en: This sentence asks about someone's waking time.
This question inquires about the presence of siblings.

items.en: What did you eat for breakfast?
items.explanation_en: This sentence asks about breakfast in the past.

items.en: Are you going to the party tonight?
items.explanation_en: This question asks about plans for the evening.

items.en: I hope you have a good time.
items.explanation_en: This sentence expresses a hope for someone's enjoyment.
This question asks about someone's leisure activities.
This sentence comments on the current weather.

items.en: Have you seen any good movies lately?
items.explanation_en: This question asks about recent movie experiences.

items.en: What time does the store open?
items.explanation_en: This question inquires about the store's opening time.

items.target: Vamos a encontrarnos para un café algún día.
items.explanation_en: This sentence suggests a future meeting for coffee.
